description: Application for Non-Material amendment to planning permission ref: PA17/02825, Dated 08/05/2018.Non Material amendment(s) Sought: 'Amendments to planning permission dated 8 May 2018 (RN: PA/17/02825) for Partial demolition, including removal of the remaining west wing and the grocer's wing (behind retained facade), alteration and refurbishment of the former Royal London Hospital and erection of a part four-storey and part seven-storey extension (including partial basement) to provide a new Tower Hamlets Council Civic Centre, comprising; office space (Use Class B1) on upper floors; a library and other customer facing functions (Use Class D1),council chamber, conference, exhibition and/or function space (Sui Generis) and an ancillary cafâ€š on the ground floor; bicycle-parking spaces, refuse store and associated facilities within the basement; blue badge car-parking spaces, a new sub-station, landscaping and associated works'.Various minor amendmenet to the approved planning drawings following detailed design stage
site_name: The Former Royal London Hospital, Whitechapel Road, London
